meanings.definition: The quality or state of being new.
meanings.sent1: The newness of the toy brought joy to the child.
meanings.sent2: I love the newness of spring when flowers bloom.
meanings.sent3: The newness of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a newness that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The newness of the idea sparked excitement in the team.

meanings.definition: The act of making something new.
meanings.sent1: His job involves creating newness in products.
meanings.sent2: Innovation requires a constant pursuit of newness.
meanings.sent3: The chef's newness in the kitchen led to delicious dishes.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brushstrokes brought newness to the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The newness of the design captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: The state of being recently made, acquired, or discovered.
meanings.sent1: The newness of the book made it a bestseller.
meanings.sent2: The excitement of newness filled the air at the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The newness of the recipe surprised everyone with its flavor.
meanings.sent4: The newness of the technology revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The newness of the discovery amazed the scientific community.
